item.title: Would a British NFL franchise be successful?
item.author: Phoebe Hunter,
item.description: Last Sunday was the 10th NFL game to be hosted at Wembley Stadium. The competing teams were the Atlanta Falcons, who sacrificed a game at their home stadium to travel over here, and the Detroit Lions. The first half of the game was a great start for the Falcons, who finished the half with a 21 point â€¦
